title: Mithril crossbow

properties.name: description
properties.value: A mithril crossbow is a crossbow that is stronger than the steel crossbow but weaker than the adamant crossbow. It requires a Ranged level of 36 to wield, and can fire bolts up to and including mithril bolts. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Item ID9181

A mithril crossbow is a crossbow that is stronger than the steel crossbow but weaker than the adamant crossbow. It requires a Ranged level of 36 to wield, and can fire bolts up to and including mithril bolts. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Mithril crossbows can be made through the Fletching skill at level 54; a player must first cut a maple stock for the crossbow from maple logs, granting 32 Fletching experience. Then, a player must add mithril limbs to the stock with a hammer in their inventory, granting 64 experience and making an unstrung mithril crossbow. Finally, a player must string the crossbow with a crossbow string, granting 32 experience. Creating a mithril crossbow from raw materials grants 128 Fletching experience in total.

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

(update)

[[File:Mithril crossbow detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''mithril crossbow''' is a [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] that is stronger than the [[steel crossbow]] but weaker than the [[adamant crossbow]]. It requires a [[Ranged]] level of 36 to wield, and can fire [[bolts]] up to and including [[mithril bolts]]. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Mithril crossbows can be made through the [[Fletching]] skill at level 54; a player must first cut a [[maple stock]] for the crossbow from [[maple logs]], granting 32 Fletching [[experience]]. Then, a player must add [[mithril limbs]] to the stock with a hammer in their inventory, granting 64 experience and making an [[mithril crossbow (u)|unstrung mithril crossbow]]. Finally, a player must string the crossbow with a [[crossbow string]], granting 32 experience. Creating a mithril crossbow from raw materials grants 128 Fletching experience in total.
